verses.verse: And afterward <WH310> Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> came <WH935> and said <WH559> to Pharaoh, <WH6547> "Thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord, <WH3068> the God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> 'Let <WH7971> My people <WH5971> go <WH7971> that they may celebrate <WH2287> a feast <WH2287> to Me in the wilderness. <WH4057>'"

But Pharaoh <WH6547> said, <WH559> "Who <WH4310> is the Lord <WH3068> that I should obey <WH8085> His voice <WH6963> to let <WH7971> Israel <WH3478> go <WH7971>? I do not know <WH3045> the Lord, <WH3068> and besides, <WH1571> I will not let <WH7971> Israel <WH3478> go. <WH7971>"

Then they said, <WH559> "The God <WH430> of the Hebrews <WH5680> has met <WH7122> with us. Please, <WH4994> let us go <WH1980> a three <WH7969> days' journey <WH1870> into the wilderness <WH4057> that we may sacrifice <WH2076> to the Lord <WH3068> our God, <WH430> lest <WH6435> He fall <WH6293> upon us with pestilence <WH1698> or <WH176> with the sword. <WH2719>"

But the king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714> said <WH559> to them, "Moses <WH4872> and Aaron, <WH175> why <WH4100> do you draw <WH6544> the people <WH5971> away <WH6544> from their work <WH4639>? Get <WH1980> [back] to your labors! <WH5450>"
Again Pharaoh <WH6547> said, <WH559> "Look, <WH2005> the people <WH5971> of the land <WH776> are now <WH6258> many, <WH7227> and you would have them cease <WH7673> from their labors! <WH5450>"
So the same <WH1931> day <WH3117> Pharaoh <WH6547> commanded <WH6680> the taskmasters <WH5065> over the people <WH5971> and their foremen, <WH7860> saying, <WH559>

"You are no <WH3808> longer <WH3254> to give <WH5414> the people <WH5971> straw <WH8401> to make <WH9226> brick <WH9226> as previously <WH8543>; <WH8032> let them go <WH1980> and gather <WH9535> straw <WH8401> for themselves. <WH1992>

"But the quota <WH4971> of bricks <WH3843> which <WH834> they were making <WH6213> previously, <WH8543> <WH8032> you shall impose <WH7760> on them; you are not to reduce <WH1639> any <WH4480> of it. Because <WH3588> they are lazy, <WH7503> therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> they cry <WH6817> out, 'Let us go <WH1980> and sacrifice <WH2076> to our God. <WH430>'
"Let the labor <WH5656> be heavier <WH3513> on the men, <WH376> and let them work <WH6213> at it that they may pay <WH8159> no <WH408> attention <WH8159> to false <WH8267> words. <WH1697>"

So the taskmasters <WH5065> of the people <WH5971> and their foremen <WH7860> went <WH3318> out and spoke <WH559> to the people, <WH5971> saying, <WH559> "Thus <WH3541> says <WH559> Pharaoh, <WH6547> 'I am not going to give <WH5414> you [any] straw. <WH8401>
'You go <WH1980> [and] get <WH3947> straw <WH8401> for yourselves wherever <WH4480> <WH834> you can find <WH4672> [it;] but none <WH369> of your labor <WH5656> will be reduced. <WH1639>' "
So the people <WH5971> scattered <WH6327> through all <WH3605> the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> to gather <WH9535> stubble <WH7179> for straw. <WH8401>

And the taskmasters <WH5065> pressed <WH213> them, saying, <WH559> "Complete <WH3615> your work <WH4639> quota, <WH4639> [your] daily <WH3117> amount, <WH1697> <WH3117> just <WH9201> as when you had <WH1961> straw. <WH8401>"

Moreover, the foremen <WH7860> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> whom <WH834> Pharaoh's taskmasters <WH5065> had set <WH7760> over <WH5921> them, were beaten <WH5221> and were asked, <WH559> "Why <WH4069> have you not completed <WH3615> your required <WH2706> amount <WH2706> either <WH1571> yesterday <WH8543> or <WH1571> today <WH3117> in making <WH9226> brick <WH9226> as previously <WH8543> <WH8032>?"

Then the foremen <WH7860> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> came <WH935> and cried <WH6817> out to Pharaoh, <WH6547> saying, <WH559> "Why <WH4100> do you deal <WH6213> this <WH3541> way <WH3541> with your servants <WH5650>?

"There <WH369> is no <WH369> straw <WH8401> given <WH5414> to your servants, <WH5650> yet they keep saying <WH559> to us, 'Make <WH6213> bricks! <WH3843>' And behold, <WH2009> your servants <WH5650> are being beaten; <WH5221> but it is the fault <WH2398> of your [own] people. <WH5971>"
But he said, <WH559> "You are lazy, <WH7503> [very] lazy; <WH7503> therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> you say, <WH559> 'Let us go <WH1980> [and] sacrifice <WH2076> to the Lord. <WH3068>'
"So go <WH1980> now <WH6258> [and] work; <WH5647> for you shall be given <WH5414> no <WH3808> straw, <WH8401> yet you must deliver <WH5414> the quota <WH8506> of bricks. <WH3843>"

And the foremen <WH7860> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> saw <WH7200> that they were in trouble <WH9563> because they were told, <WH559> "You must not reduce <WH1639> [your] daily <WH3117> amount <WH1697> <WH3117> of bricks. <WH3843>"
When they left <WH3318> Pharaoh's presence, <WH4480> <WH854> they met <WH6293> Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> as they were waiting <WH5324> for them.

And they said <WH559> to them, "May the Lord <WH3068> look <WH7200> upon you and judge <WH8199> [you,] for you have made <WH887> us odious <WH887> <WH7381> in Pharaoh's sight <WH5869> and in the sight <WH5869> of his servants, <WH5650> to put <WH5414> a sword <WH2719> in their hand <WH3027> to kill <WH2026> us."

Then Moses <WH4872> returned <WH7725> to the Lord <WH3068> and said, <WH559> "O Lord, <WH136> why <WH4100> hast Thou brought <WH7489> harm <WH7489> to this <WH2088> people <WH5971>? Why <WH4100> didst Thou ever <WH2088> send <WH7971> me?

"Ever since <WH9241> I came <WH935> to Pharaoh <WH6547> to speak <WH1696> in Thy name, <WH8034> he has done <WH7489> harm <WH7489> to this <WH2088> people; <WH5971> and Thou hast not delivered <WH5337> Thy people <WH5971> at all. <WH5337>"
